tool_description: Continuously monitors DNS health, response times, and availability with customizable alerting and reporting capabilities.

record_types.description: DNS record types to monitor (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS)

response_time_threshold.description: Alert threshold for DNS response time in milliseconds

failure_threshold.description: Number of consecutive failures before alerting

error_messages: Invalid domain list: One or more domains are not valid.
Unsupported record type: Use supported record types A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS.
Invalid check interval: Interval must be between 1 and 1440 minutes.
Invalid email format: Alert email must be a valid email address.
Threshold out of range: Response time threshold must be between 100 and 30000 milliseconds.
Monitoring limit exceeded: Maximum 50 domains can be monitored simultaneously.
usage: Provide domains and record types to monitor. Configure check intervals, alert settings, and response time thresholds. The tool sets up continuous monitoring with alerting.

monitor_id.description: Unique identifier for the monitoring session

baseline_response_time.description: Average baseline response time in milliseconds

next_check.description: Next scheduled check time in ISO format
